issue.message: Functional interface parameters (such as parameter 1, "owner", in androidx.testutils.LifecycleOwnerUtils.waitUntilState) should be last to improve Kotlin interoperability; see https://kotlinlang.org/docs/reference/java-interop.html#sam-conversions

Functional interface parameters (such as parameter 1, "owner", in androidx.testutils.LifecycleOwnerUtils.waitUntilState) should be last to improve Kotlin interoperability; see https://kotlinlang.org/docs/reference/java-interop.html#sam-conversions
